title: Discharge Readiness Assessment - Insufficient Data
factors: Incomplete laboratory data - no recent labs available
Limited vital signs - only single measurement recorded
Unknown length of stay and comorbidities
explanation: Unable to calculate LACE index or assess discharge readiness due to insufficient clinical data. The following information is required for accurate assessment: Complete laboratory panel (CBC, BMP, renal function), trend of vital signs over time (minimum 24 hours), comprehensive medication reconciliation including home medications, detailed clinical notes regarding reason for admission and treatment plan, past medical history and comorbidities, functional status assessment, and social support evaluation. Recommend completing full admission workup before discharge planning can proceed.
